title: Question about Yasuo and Rivens Event boarders
body:
So I had did the event and missions and got both icon with boarders during the event. I however didnt have the fund for both skins during the event.
I did an ARAM and someone unlocked skins and i had yasuo and gotten his nightbringer skin. It didnt have a boarder in the loading screen.

Do i need to own them to have it?
Or did i also need to buy the skins during event?

replies.body: You do need to actually buy the skin to have the border equipped. Even though the event is over, you can still buy the skins now and have the borders applied.
You have to own the skin if you unlocked the boarder during the event.
